CustomField.description: Its the API Name, The Std fields: Name, Id, ContactId Std fields on Std objects: Contact.FirstName, Contact.MailingStreet, Account.Name Custom fields: BirthPlace__c Custom fields on Std objects: Account.Legacy_Id__c, Account.Legacy_Id__pc Custom fields on Custom objects: SecondaryContact__r.Birth_Place__c
